ygData.subject: Call for help.
ygData.msgSnippet: * Shadow Cat flies towards the bumbling speck. As she gains speed, she notices that the small bot was slowing down. Dumbly, she relizes that he wasn t made for

X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 Dec 2000 23:02:17.0779 (UTC) FILETIME=[3FD18030:01C05E46]
From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>


* Shadow Cat flies towards the bumbling speck. As she gains speed, she 
notices that the small bot was slowing down. Dumbly, she relizes that he 
wasn't made for such long, high flights. If he kept going too long, he would 
either pass out or crash, and if he's high enough he could get seriously 
damaged. She speed up a bit more, hoping to catch him before such a thing 
occured. The bumbling speck started to droop and go down slowly. She dove 
down and swooped up, catching the little tyke by suprise. And just in time 
too. He was panting and unable to put up much of a fight, and, in the end, 
she flew away with him, cradled in her arms, with some scratches and 
milk-teeth marks.8

*SNow Tech glanced up as Shadow Cat decended from the air, craddling her 
precious cargo and crooning softly to it so it wouldn't be afraid.
He sighed and smiled to her when she landed next to him.*

" You have a way with kids, Shadow, mabey you should think of a career in 
baby-sittin!"

*Hsadow Cat glared at Snow Tech and smacked him on the arm, but when the 
liitle 'un started to wake, she began crooning again, reduced to giving him 
sideways glares.*

* NSow Tech grins and turns his back to her, effectivly mooning her. He 
straightens his back and wipes the smile off his face. He presses his 
com-link and broadcasts a signal.*

" To any Maximals in the vaciniety, we have crashed landed and ask for your 
service. I repeat, we have crash landed and require your services."

* and after a pause, grins evily and adds,*

" And we know your out there, we've been watching!"
